The sound is echoing i.e. repeating itself twice. Any fixes?
@ rijumone - tryt update your sound card driver or change audio settings from Control Panel - Audio
@nosTeam: Could you give me step-by-step instructions to update the sound driver? It would be a great help.

@rijumone
Right click on MY COMPUTER--select PROPERTIES--just below menu bar(left side) u can find DEVICE PROPERTIES click n open.
All device drivers are listed here.
duoble click on SOUND, VIDEO AND GAME CONTROLLERS (driver name depends on model) for my system--IDT HIGH DEFINITION AUDIO CODEC--right click and select UPDATE DRIVER SOFTWARE--select SEARCH AUTOMATICALLY FOR UPDATE DRIVER SOFTWARE(Ensure internet connection) n wait 4 result or go 4 Tea.
(u can follow d same procedure to update all of your drivers.)don forget 2 leave d result- by by
hey guys those hu r using 15.6" monitor, go to settings--Graphics--screen resolution nd set 1280X720 nd rest of d graphics set to low/none/off. for me it works great, cheers>>>>>>>:)
